pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Thoughtful Saver of Results // Helps with the thoughtful saving, reading, and management of result files (using 'rds' files). The core functions take a list of parameters that are used to generate a unique hash to save results under. Then, the same parameter list can be used to read those results back in. This is helpful to avoid clunky file naming when running a large number of simulations. Additionally, helper functions are available for compiling a flat file of parameters of saved results, monitoring result usage, and cleaning up unwanted or unused results. For more information, visit the 'indexr' homepage https://lharris421.github.io/indexr/.
